4302000.name: West
4302000.description:
'West' is a 2.5D side-scrolling adventure inspired by CD-ROM games of the 1990's.

Shortly after having his memory stolen by a witch residing in the Mountains, West wakes up on a beach and meets a fox who, coincidentally, has been trying to find the same witch who's been threatening his town.

You and him must find the pieces of West's memory, defeat the witch, and save the town.

  • Charming art

The game attempts to replicate the visual style of old, verging-on-shovelware CD-ROM games from the late 90's, with simple and colorful graphics

  • Interesting characters

West's town is full of unique and interesting characters to get to know. Help them out, let them help you, and learn about the world in the process.

  • Puzzles

Use your social skills to take advantage of the prowess of the people you meet to complete puzzles, and use your own competencies to complete others'.

Play the first two islands of the game for free now!
4302000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
